column5: Got an idea I'd like to keep the boat in the garage this winter but looks like a Fulton Fold Away Coupler may be needed to make space.  I see PA has the 3X3 but does anyone sell the 3X4 in the Hamilton area?  I see them online but with shipping costs etc. would be cheaper local I hope.  thx.
Have you tried ?  Bay City Marine Don Hyde Marine Proctor Marine

Not sure if this is a good price  says free shipping. https://www.amazon.ca/Fulton-Performance-Fold-Away-Trailer-Rating/dp/B00J4Y27TU/ref=sr_1_4?ie=UTF8&qid=1467074325&sr=8-4&keywords=fulton+fold+away
These guys will ship as well.  CDN  http://www.cerka.ca/catalog/coupler_folding.asp  Cheers, Mark

E-Trailer  https://www.etrailer.com/Folding-Tongue/Fulton/FHDPW340300.html  They have free shipping if your order is over a $100.00. So if there's nothing else you need; it'll cost you approx $45.00 for shipping Your total would be approx $126.00 plus tax. I've welded a few of these Fulton couplers on; they seem to be very well made.  Dan.
would Miska or JDJ carry something like this?  hwy 6 north of waterdown
Could try this place on Mountain Rd here in Grimsby, they stock a lot of boat trailer parts.  http://www.hitchmantrailers.ca/
The hitch factory on Dartnall might be worth a call
